an5.30:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kosalesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena icchanangalam nama kosalanam brahmanagamo tadavasari.
an5.30:1.3: Tatra sudam bhagava icchanangale viharati icchanangalavanasande.
an5.30:1.5: “samano khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakula pabbajito icchanangalam anuppatto; icchanangale viharati icchanangalavanasande.
an5.30:1.6: Tam kho pana bhavantam gotamam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
an5.30:1.7: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho vijjacaranasampanno sugato lokavidu anuttaro purisadammasarathi, sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati’.
an5.30:1.8: So imam lokam sadevakam samarakam sabrahmakam sassamanabrahmanim pajam sadevamanussam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedeti.
an5.30:1.9: So dhammam deseti adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam, kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakaseti.
an5.30:1.10: Sadhu kho pana tatharupanam arahatam dassanam hoti”ti.
an5.30:1.11: Atha kho icchanangalaka brahmanagahapatika tassa rattiya accayena pahutam khadaniyam bhojaniyam adaya yena icchanangalavanasando tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bahidvarakotthake atthamsu uccasaddamahasadda.
an5.30:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma nagito bhagavato upatthako hoti.
an5.30:2.2: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam nagitam amantesi:
an5.30:2.3: “ke pana kho, nagita, uccasaddamahasadda, kevatta manne macchavilope”ti?
an5.30:2.4: “Ete, bhante, icchanangalaka brahmanagahapatika pahutam khadaniyam bhojaniyam adaya bahidvarakotthake thita bhagavantanneva uddissa bhikkhusanghanca”ti.
an5.30:2.5: “Maham, nagita, yasena samagamam, ma ca maya yaso.
an5.30:2.6: Yo kho, nagita, nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhi assa akicchalabhi akasiralabhi, yassaham nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an5.30:2.7: So tam milhasukham middhasukham labhasakkarasilokasukham sadiyeyya”ti.
an5.30:3.3: Yena yeneva dani bhagava gamissati tamninnava gamissanti brahmanagahapatika negama ceva janapada ca.
an5.30:3.4: Seyyathapi, bhante, thullaphusitake deve vassante yathaninnam udakani pavattanti;
an5.30:3.5: evamevam kho, bhante, yena yeneva dani bhagava gamissati, tamninnava gamissanti brahmanagahapatika negama ceva janapada ca.
an5.30:4.1: “Maham, nagita, yasena samagamam, ma ca maya yaso.
an5.30:4.2: Yo kho, nagita, nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhi assa akicchalabhi akasiralabhi, yassaham nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an5.30:4.3: So tam milhasukham middhasukham labhasakkarasilokasukham sadiyeyya.
an5.30:4.6: Piyanam kho, nagita, viparinamannathabhava uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa—
an5.30:4.8: Asubhanimittanuyogam anuyuttassa kho, nagita, subhanimitte patikulyata santhati—
an5.30:4.10: Chasu kho, nagita, phassayatanesu aniccanupassino viharato phasse patikulyata santhati—
an5.30:4.12: Pancasu kho, nagita, upadanakkhandhesu udayabbayanupassino viharato upadane patikulyata santhati—
